title: Tick History Request
description: Get historic tick data for a given symbol name

end.description: Epoch value representing the end-datetime of the ticks. If non-numeric value (e.g. "latest", the end-datetime will be the latest available timestamp.

start.description: Epoch value representing the start-datetime of the ticks (default: 1 yr ago)

count.description: An upper limit on ticks to receive (default: 500)

style.description: The tick-output style: must be one of 'ticks' or 'candles' (default: 'ticks')

granularity.description: Provide for style: 'candles'. Candle time-dimension width setting: typically 'M1', 'M5', 'M10', 'M30', 'H1', 'H2', 'H4', 'H8', or 'D' (default: 'M1'). The granularity units are (M)inute, (H)our, (S)econd, and (D)ay. Currently for 'Day' granularity, only the term 'D' is allowed, signifying 1 Day.  For the other units, other numeric values are possible (within reason).

adjust_start_time.description: If market is closed at the end time, or license limit is before end time, then move interval backwards.

passthrough.description: Optional field, used to pass data through the websocket, which may be retrieved via the echo_req output field.
